data.text: Yatogoligwe Mkulu Nguluwi, italawe lya heni,
Heye ndo igano lya kwimilila lya heni na ngome ya heni
Gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, munhu ndo choni mbaka umlolele?
Uchumule ulanga wa hegwe, gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, uduliche.
Ugolole moko wa hegwe kulawa kuchanya,
Undohole na ipanga lya mng'honyo yamemile wihe,
Wasongolo wa hetwe wakule goya kota mizuchila kuli kagunda,
Migongolo ja hetwe jiwe jinenehe na mong'ho,
Kukomya, nawatambichizwa wanhu wa isi wawele watambichizwe mbuli azo.
